content:
| *Mulona lapidaria* | |
| --- | --- |
| Scientific classification | |
| Kingdom: | Animalia |
| Phylum: | Arthropoda |
| Class: | Insecta |
| Order: | Lepidoptera |
| Family: | Erebidae |
| Subfamily: | Arctiinae |
| Genus: | *Mulona* |
| Species: | ***M. lapidaria*** |
| Binomial name | |
| ***Mulona lapidaria***Walker, 1866 | |

***Mulona lapidaria*** is a moth of the subfamily Arctiinae. It was described by Francis Walker in 1866\. It is found on Haiti.
